member.param: Do you want to create tms-compatible tiles?

member.name: M:GTiff2Tiles.Core.Image.IImage.GenerateTilesAsync(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.IProgress{System.Double},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Crops input tiff for each zoom.
Experimental version, don't use in release app!
There's an issue with NetVips performance on Windows, so when it's fixed -- this version will replace the current method for cropping tiles.
member.param: Do you want to create tms-compatible tiles?
Set to to use this method.
